alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Effingham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 15 at 7:24PM EDT until August 15 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Georgia, including the following counties, Bryan, Chatham and Effingham. Portions of southeast South Carolina, including the following counties, Beaufort and Jasper. * WHEN...Until 930 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 723 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pooler, Bluffton, Savannah International Airport, Godley Station, Hutchinson Island, Downtown Savannah, Bellinger Hill Area, I-16/I-95 Interchange, Jasper, Rincon, Garden City, Port Wentworth, Hardeeville, Bloomingdale, Monteith, Meinhard, Purysburgh, Pritchardville, Sun City and Meldrim.
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
